content.en: Distracted driving detection: Researchers have been exploring the use of deep learning algorithms to detect distracted driving in real-time. These algorithms, such as Convolutional Neural Networks (CNN) and deep convolutional neural networks, are being used to develop systems that can accurately recognize and classify distracted drivers. Some studies even propose hybrid schemes that combine deep learning with handcrafted features to improve detection. By leveraging the power of deep learning, researchers aim to design efficient and effective systems for detecting and addressing driver distraction.
content.da: Opdagelse af distraheret kørsel: Forskere har undersøgt brugen af deep learning-algoritmer til at opdage distraheret kørsel i realtid. Disse algoritmer, såsom konvolutionelle neurale netværk (CNN) og dybe konvolutionelle neurale netværk, bliver anvendt til at udvikle systemer, der nøjagtigt kan genkende og klassificere distraherede bilister. Nogle studier foreslår endda hybride metoder, der kombinerer deep learning med håndlavede funktioner for at forbedre opdagelsen. Ved at udnytte kraften i deep learning, sigter forskerne mod at designe effektive og effektfulde systemer til at opdage og håndtere førerens distraktion.
